main event: A spherical UFO was sighted in St. Paul, Minnesota on 14th August 1955, traveling on a straight path at an even speed.
interesting points: The UFO was described as spherical in shape, with an orange to red-orange color.
It traveled through a hazy area and was estimated to be larger than a pinhead but smaller than a pea when seen at arm's length.
The UFO disappeared at an angle of 45 to 52 degrees from the horizon, after traveling on a straight path for 5 to 12 seconds.
The report concluded that the UFO was possibly a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical object due to insufficient data for evaluation.
The investigation revealed no confirmation of the sighting and deemed the data insufficient to reveal any possibilities.
